ng ths pose is set 'before' the time skip and other events.


Glancing up a=
t the LORD ELDER, Wheelie glanced up at him from his position over nearby t=
he ARK.

Finally, WHEELIE spoke, "They went out looking for a fight.  They =
did not intend to go gentle into that good night.  While everyone is about =
and away, someone else may come to play.  The Ark is what's here in the pas=
t, someone else may consider it to be excessive ballast.  Something is up, =
what I don't know, I just know I see Maximals about on the go.  I don't kno=
w why they're running around, nor what they intend to do on the ground."

W=
atching as the assault team zipped away, "Something may happen to call them=
 back, or they may encounter a bit of flak.  What they intend, I don't know=
.  I just know you don't put your all into one big throw.  You sometimes wa=
nt to hold some back, just in case you get a smack.  If they go into a trap=
, be lured away for an attack.  At the Ark some of us must stay.  Especiall=
y while everyone else is away."

Continuing to glance around, "This planet =
is not as it will be, etched into my memory.  It will be different some day=
.  I don't belong here any way.  But what way iwll it go?  That is what I d=
o not know.  Will I still someday meet my friend?  Even though he will die =
in the end?  I do not know what will be our fate.  I can only simply commis=
serate."
